name: Talkpush Limited
description: Providing of a recruitment platform designed to leverage the power of messaging and social media. The company's platform consists of a recruitment chatbot compatible with social media, which conducts interviews and an application management tool, enabling recruiters to evaluate and hire candidates faster and making conversations easier to start.
